post.text:
Women have the power to stop Trump.

IWillVote.com
http://hrc.io/WomenDonate

comment.author: Jared
comment.text: People of all ages: Women - black/ white, Afro-Americans, Asians, Mexicans, Muslims, peoples of all religions, men who have self-respect & respect for all people, VOTE AGAINST THE MAN TRUMP WHO SHOWS U ONLY HATRED & REPUGNANCE; vote for Hilary who embraces all of U and, In so doing, will do her best for U but don't allow the majority Republican house to treat her the way they have been treating Obama...they block virtually everything he wanted to do for U, then blame him for failure etc.... so hypocritical... don't let it happen her Hilary.
